product_name: MPOWERD Luci Outdoor Inflatable Solar Lantern
long_description: Outdoors or in, this inflatable lantern lights up the night with clear, solar-powered brilliance. Simply charge it up in the sun, and enjoy an array of white LED light at home, campsites or roadsides.
short_description: Outdoors or in, this inflatable lantern lights up the night with clear, solar-powered brilliance. Simply charge it up in the sun, and enjoy an array of white LED light at home, campsites or roadsides.
